Robin Hood tells the story of an expert archer, previously interested only in self-preservation, in the service of King Richard's army against the French. After the death of Richard, Robin goes to Nottingham, a town suffering because of corruption of a despotic sheriff and charging exorbitant tax, which falls for the fiery widow Lady Marion (Oscar winner Cate Blanchett Ã‚Â®), a woman suspicious of the identity and motives of this forest warrior. Waiting win Lady Marion and save the village, Robin assembles a gang whose lethal mercenary skills are matched only by his desire to enjoy life. Together, they begin to plunder the rich indulgent to correct the injustices committed by the sheriff. With the weakening of their country after decades of war, suffering from the ineffective rule of the new king and vulnerable because of local uprisings and threats from afar, Robin and his men set out on an even bigger adventure. These unlikely heroes and their friends want to protect his country from bloody civil war and return glory to England once more.
